sentences.en: ‘It's not the same without Rosie.’ ‘I know.’.
sentences.cn: “缺少了罗茜就不一样了。”“我知道。”。

sentences.en: "I know you," he said flatly, matter-of-fact, neutral in tone.
sentences.cn: “我认识你。”他平淡地说道，就事论事，不带任何感情。

sentences.en: all I knew was that she was a schoolteacher.
sentences.cn: 就我所知，她是一个教师。

sentences.en: apocalyptic expectations, envisaging &B{the end of the world as we know it}.
sentences.cn: 启示录的期待，展现了我们现在所了解的世界末日。

sentences.en: By the time he's twenty he'll know everyone worth knowing in Washington.
sentences.cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

sentences.en: Didn’t you know that?
sentences.cn: 你不知道那件事吗？

sentences.en: God knows what else they might find.
sentences.cn: 天知道他们还能发现什么。

sentences.en: God knows, we deserve a spot of bubbly after all these years.
sentences.cn: 天也知道，经过了这么多年我们应得一点香槟酒。

sentences.en: he had a tip from a friend in the know: the horse was a cert.
sentences.cn: 她有一条从知晓内情的朋友那里得来的秘密消息： 这匹马定能赢。

sentences.en: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.cn: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

sentences.en: How do we know you're not just covering up for your friend?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么知道你不只是在为自己的朋友遮掩呢？

sentences.en: I didn't know Ron had that much strength of character.
sentences.cn: 我当时不知道罗恩有那么坚强的个性。

sentences.en: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.cn: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.en: I know how to darn, and how to sew a button on.
sentences.cn: 我会打补丁，缝纽扣。

sentences.en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentences.en: I know of no one who would want to murder Albert.
sentences.cn: 我没听说有人想杀艾伯特。

sentences.en: I know that you'vebeen studying chimpanzees for thirty years now.
sentences.cn: 我知道你研究黑猩猩至今已有30年了。

sentences.en: I know what, let's do it now.
sentences.cn: 我有个主意，我们现在干吧。

sentences.en: I know you will join me in wishing them Godspeed.
sentences.cn: 我知道你会同我一起祝愿他们诸事顺遂的。

sentences.en: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
sentences.cn: 我以为你想马上知道。

sentences.en: I was, don't you know, a great motoring enthusiast in those days.
sentences.cn: 我那时，你是知道的，疯狂热爱驾车兜风。

sentences.en: If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.cn: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.en: Kaspar had spoken know-ledgeably about the state of agriculture in Europe.
sentences.cn: 卡斯帕对欧洲农业状况发表了一番颇有见地的见解。

sentences.en: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.cn: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.en: she could be dead for all I know.
sentences.cn: 就我所知，她可能已死了。

sentences.en: the Right Honourable Gentleman's priorities do not add up and he knows it.
sentences.cn: 绅士阁下的优先权不合情理，他自己也清楚这一点。

sentences.en: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.cn: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.en: These chaps know their stuff after seven years of war.
sentences.cn: 7年的战争过后，这些家伙都成了作战行家。

sentences.en: We all know that fats spoil by becoming rancid.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道油脂变质后会发臭。

sentences.en: We know some sex offenders dupe the psychologists who assess them.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有些性犯罪者会愚弄给他们做测评的心理学家。

sentences.en: We'll manage somehow, you and me. I know we will.
sentences.cn: 我和你，我们总能应付过去的。我知道我们会的。

sentences.en: Who knows the answer?
sentences.cn: 谁知道答案？

sentences.en: You have to know where to stand for a good viewpoint.
sentences.cn: 你得知道站在哪里观察角度比较理想。

sentences.en: you ought to know better than to ask that.
sentences.cn: 你应该变聪明些，别问此事。

sentences.en: you weren't to know he was about to die.
sentences.cn: 你无法知道她快要死了。

words.tran_cn: 可知的；能认识的；易知的
博学的；狡猾的；心照不宣的
已知的；知名的；大家知道的

phrases.tran_cn: 众所周知；正如我们所知
如你所知；正如你知道的

phrases.phrase: before one knows where one is (或before one knows i

phrases.tran_cn: ［用于强调陈述的真实性］天也知道
我有个主意，我有个建议
了解，知道……的情况；知道关于
有头脑；明事理；不会上当
变聪明些，不再相信，不再上当
◎知道是怎么回事，深知其中滋味
